class.name: r2c_tutorial/SensorHardwareInterface
class.description: Hardware interface for sensor data from real hardware (Teensy). Subscribes to sensor topics and exposes values through ros2_control state interfaces. Use this plugin when sim_mode:=false (real hardware mode).

class.name: r2c_tutorial/SensorHardwareInterfaceSim
class.description: Hardware interface for simulated sensor data in Gazebo. Generates synthetic sensor values and integrates with gz_ros2_control. Use this plugin when sim_mode:=true (Gazebo simulation mode). Supports command interfaces for test value injection.
